text: Adam N. Godley (born 22 July 1964) is an English-American actor. He has been nominated for two Tony Awards. Godley's movie roles include Love Actually (2003), Nanny McPhee (2005), Charlie and the Chocolate Factory (2005), Elizabeth: The Golden Age (2007), and The Theory of Everything (2014). His movie television roles include Elliott Schwartz in Breaking Bad (2008–2013), Nigel Nesbitt in Suits (2013), Phinneus Pogo in The Umbrella Academy (2019–present), and Archie the Archbishop in The Great (2020–2023). Godley was born to Jewish parents in Amersham, England on 22 July 1964.
